Name: Inferno Breath
Desc: Summons an ancient dragon that breathes fire, leaving a trail of fire that deals continuous damage to those on it. The trail of fire does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 70. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 300% Damage 8 times, and then inflicts DoT.
Cooldown: 20 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 70. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 970% Damage 14 times, and then deals DoT.
Cooldown: 20 sec.
